#summary How to build spgpu on Windows and Linux.

= Introduction =

In this wiki you will learn how to build *spgpu*.

= Linux (and other unix systems) =

{{{
cd spgpu/build/cmake
sh configure.sh
make
}}}

= Windows (Microsoft Visual Studio 2010) =

You will find the solution file _spgpu.sln_ in spgpu/build/vs2010/
